text:
Talk with your doctor about clinical trials that may be right for you. General information about clinical trials is available from the NCI website.
		                
		                
		                    Stage I Testicular Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage I testicular cancer depends on whether the cancer is a seminoma or a nonseminoma.    Treatment of seminoma may include the following:         -  Surgery to remove the testicle, followed by surveillance.    - For patients who
